scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev --prefix backend" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start --prefix backend & cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start --prefix frontend
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm --prefix backend run test
